words.def: any of numerous small rodents typically resembling diminutive rats having pointed snouts and small ears on elongated bodies with slender usually hairless tails
Of or pertaining to the analysis of a cultural system or its features from the perspective of a participant in that culture.
a city in southeastern France on the Mediterranean
excavation in the earth from which ores and minerals are extracted
game in which matchsticks are arranged in rows and players alternately remove one or more of them
water frozen in the solid state
destruction of heart tissue resulting from obstruction of the blood supply to the heart muscle
a quad with a square body
half the width of an em
a unit of length equal to one twelfth of a foot
